casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 26, 2007. Anne M. Gomez, Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Eddie Lamar Taylor. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State.

*595The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of February 2007 by Defendant to Bypass Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of February 2007."
